text: Phira asim pani di ika buda tom ika bharuna da rupa dita, phira bharuna nu masa da ika lokara bana'i'a, phira lothare de adara hadi'am paida kiti'am. Phira asim hadi'am ute masa carha dita. Phira asim usa nu ika navem rupa vica kharha kita. Tam uha alaha vadi'am barakatam vala ate ati utama sirajanahara hai
